"Shioji": "Yo! Takin' good care of your equipment?"
"It don't matter how strong an ARKS is; if their equipment's in tatters, they can't fight at their best."
"Think of your gear as your most valuable partner, and afford it as much respect."
"Just the ARKS I wanted to see."
"I'm Shioji, and I do equipment research here in Stia."
"What say you sit a spell and listen to some advice I've got for ya?"
"I need you to get some data on the Ore known as \"Hexakite\"."
"They say it can be found in Outer Mediola: Sector 2. Thanks again."
"Oh, you're busy. Let me know if you get some spare time."
"You're back! Alright, lay 'em out here and I'll start scanning them."
"...Hm-hm... I see."
"As I thought, this Ore structure is quite different from those found in Aelio."
"We might be able to use these to make adjustments to new equipment as well."
"I'll be sure to inform the technology department and have them use this information to improve our equipment."
"It looks like Stia may have its own wealth of useful Ores."
"Alright! My inner researcher is starting to reawaken!"
"I got some valuable data thanks to you."
"I appreciate it. I hope to be able to depend on you if something else comes up."
"Here in Stia, every day is a battle."
"If your gear ain't in perfect condition, it doesn't matter how many lives you've got, they won't be enough."
"Ho there! I heard you played a big part in that last battle."
"Taking those abilities into account, there's another favor I'd like to ask of you."
"Would you consider it?"
"\"Inferium\" can be gathered in Outer Mediola: Sector 1."
"There's rumors that you can only find it during certain weather."
"I know it's a lot to ask, but since it's you, I have faith that it'll work out."
"Oh, alright... Come back if you change your mind!"
"Oh, you're back. Let me start the data scan right away."
"...Hum. So this is \"Inferium\"... The rumors simply don't do it justice!"
"It's some of the strongest I've seen, and it seems capable of bonding with other Ores!"
"Agh, I can only imagine the potential applications this could have!"
"Equipment made with this would easily be some of the best on the market."
"Hah! The folks in the technology department will be flabbergasted when they see this!"
"...!! Ahem! ...My apologies, it's... been a while since I've lost my composure like that."
"Thank you. You've really done a lot for me."
"Discovering new Ores often results in improvements to our equipment."
"When I think of what's possible with the Ores of Stia, I get far too giddy for my age."
"It ain't easy living in Stia, but from the bottom of my heart, I can say I'm glad I came here."
